fields.name: Tips
fields.value:
• Leveling becomes harder at around level 3000 and very hard at around level 5000. Consider making a leveling form that’s separate from your arena form when leveling becomes difficult for you.
• Use Hohenheim for leveling whenever possible to maximize coin earning.
• Make heavy use of AoE (area of effect) troops to soften enemy units: Goblikazes, Ballista, Ice Mage, Priest Mage
• If you are really stuck at a level, use your arena hero to help you get through.
